roleset.name: to cultivate or dig up with a hoe
roleset.note: HOE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hoe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from hoe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: infinitive
example.text: I was impressed [*-1] by the perceptiveness of your Sept. 12 story `` Rural Enterprise : Tough Row [0][*] To Hoe [*T*-2] . ''
